metas.description: All the betting and race news for the 2015 Coral cup at the Cheltenham Festival.

page.content:
Cheltenham Festival Day 2 Races - Coral Cup Odds

The Coral Cup follows the Queen Mother Champion Chase on the day 2 card at the Cheltenham Festival, and it has developed into an excellent renewal since it was first run in 1993. There is always a big field for this 2 mile 5 furlong race which does make it difficult for punters to decide on, this is backed up by the fact that only two favourites have won the Coral Cup since it was first run.

Coral Cup Result

14:40 Coral Cup (Grade 3 Handicap Hurdle)
1.Aux Ptits Soins - P Nicholls - S Twiston-Davies - 9/1
2.Zabana - A Lynch - R Colgan - 25/1
3.Activial - H Fry - N Fehily - 17/2f
4.Taglietelle - G Elliott - P Carberry - 14/1
5.Volnay De Thaix - N Henderson - P Carberry - 18/1
26 Ran
